name: LinkedOn
description:
Puzzle game made for the gmtk 2021 gamejam where you control multiple characters (white boxes) that are linked (joined) by their control inputs.

Use the arrow keys or (w, a, s, d) to move your characters. The goal of the game is to have each character on top of a green box(goal tile).

Use the "R" key to restart the level, the "B" to jump back to the previous level and "N" key to skip to the next level.

I made this game by myself so I didn't have time to make the it prettier, but I hope you can still enjoy it. I've play tested and beat each level multiple times so rest assured they're all solvable (even 11 and 12).

NOTE: The game loops back after the 12th level, so if it feels like you're playing from the start again, it's because you are haha. Have fun!
